_description: Feature Consistency System Configuration - Testing Environment

warmup_trim_days.description: Number of days to trim from start to remove indicator warm-up period
warmup_trim_days.environment_note: Minimal warmup for fast test execution

nan_drop_threshold_per_symbol.description: Maximum NaN ratio allowed per symbol (0.15 = 15%)
nan_drop_threshold_per_symbol.environment_note: Lenient threshold for testing with synthetic/limited data

global_feature_keep_ratio.description: Minimum symbol coverage required to keep feature globally (0.80 = 80%)
global_feature_keep_ratio.environment_note: Lower threshold to test edge cases

min_symbol_feature_coverage.description: Minimum feature coverage required to include symbol (0.70 = 70%)
min_symbol_feature_coverage.environment_note: Lower threshold for comprehensive testing scenarios

use_missingness_mask.description: Whether to create _isnan columns for missing value indicators
use_missingness_mask.environment_note: Enabled to test missingness handling functionality

imputation_strategy.environment_note: Zero imputation for predictable test results

imputation_value.description: Value to use for final imputation when strategy is 'zero'

manifest_path.description: Path to save/load feature manifest JSON file

detailed_logging.description: Enable detailed logging of processing decisions

testing_settings.environment_note: Enhanced validation and debugging for testing

rules.imputation_strategy: Must be one of: zero, mean, median
rules.log_level: Must be one of: DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR
